Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 4
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IV; sheet 1(forty-two fragments); Hieratic literary text verso and recto. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto 1; Verso 10 (second part). Recto: Monothestic Hymns Verso: A Student's Miscellany
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner. Hieratic Papyri, Vol. 1 pp. 28-44, Vol. 2. Plate 12, Recto 1; Plate 10, Verso 10 (second part). The verso of this manuscript is available om T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381089) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381089)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, bloom, fractured Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete - fragmentary)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
